system.name: Basic Ranged Attacks
system.effect: Choose one of Firestarter, Fountain, Freezer, Guster, Materializer, or Zapper. Struggle Attacks modified by that Capability may now be made at a range of up to 6 meters. This Pok√© Edge may be taken multiple times, selecting a different Capability each time.
system.prerequisites: Firestarter, Fountain, Freezer, Guster, Materializer, or Zapper
